Human Activity Recognition

```{r, warning=FALSE}
library(data.table)
library(caret)
library(ggplot2)
library(data.table)
library(GGally)

trainingPrime <- fread("pml-training.csv")
testingFinal <- fread("pml-testing.csv")
```
```{r}
dim(trainingPrime)
```
```{r}
dim(testingFinal)
```

Remove columns containing NAs
```{r, cache=TRUE}
trainingPrime <- t(na.omit(t(trainingPrime)))
trainingPrime <- trainingPrime[, -c(1:7)]
toDrop <- c("^kurtosis*","^skewness*","yaw")
trainingPrime <- trainingPrime[, -grep(paste(toDrop, collapse = "|"),
                                       colnames(trainingPrime))]
training1 <- as.data.table(trainingPrime)
training1$classe <- as.factor(training1$classe)
training1[,1:48] <- sapply(training1[,1:48], as.numeric)
dim(trainingPrime)
```
```{r}
str(trainingPrime)
```

*First Cross Validation - Random Forest*
```{r}
set.seed(1704111)
inTrainCV1 <- createDataPartition(y=training1$classe,
                                  p=.7, list=FALSE)
trainingCV1 <- training1[inTrainCV1,]
testingCV1 <- training1[-inTrainCV1,]
```
```{r}
dim(trainingCV1)
```
```{r}
dim(testingCV1)
```
```{r}
summary(trainingCV1)
```


```{r}
modFit <- train(classe ~., data=trainingCV1, method="rf", prox=TRUE)
modFit
```
